shef.mt.tools.term

Class TerminologyEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • shef.mt.tools.term.TerminologyEntry

  • public class TerminologyEntry
extends java.lang.Object
    an entry for the terminology hashmap; consists of a phrase (e.g. in the source language) and its counterpart (in the target language); in case of monolingual terminologies the counterpart can be left NULL

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TerminologyEntry(java.lang.String rawline)
      Entry constructor from a raw line from a terminology file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TerminologyEntry

        public TerminologyEntry(java.lang.String rawline)
        Entry constructor from a raw line from a terminology file. A line with two tab-separated phrases means a bilingual entry.
